title: Spin crossover iron complexes with spin transition near room temperature based on nitrogen ligands containing aromatic rings: from molecular design to functional devices
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00688C, Review Article
Yongjie Zhang, Ramón Torres-Cavanillas, Xinxin Yan, Yixun Zeng, Mengyun Jiang, Miguel Clemente-León, Eugenio Coronado, Shengwei Shi
Recent progress of spin crossover complexes with spin transition near room temperature has been summarized from molecular design to functional devices, and current challenges are highlighted to indicate their future directions.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
